synopsis.text: Our story follows Ars Louvent, a once ordinary office worker who finds himself reincarnated in the Summerforth Empire as the son of a minor noble family. In this medieval-like world filled with magic and political unrest, Ars possesses a unique skill: Appraisal, which allows him to see the abilities and potential of those around him. Despite his lack of physical strength or magical prowess, Ars uses his skill to seek out hidden talents and recruit them to his cause, aiming to protect his small domain from the imminent conflict. As he gathers a diverse group of exceptional individuals, Ars embarks on a journey to unite the land and change the fate of his kingdom. Join Ars and his unique allies as they strive to create a better future in this thrilling isekai adventure!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
